txt.en: 'Ready yourself! The enemy is preparing another assault, [placeholder]!'
Talk to Lamlor in the besieged Dome of the Sun and complete 'The Withered Tree'
Talk to Ingold in the besieged city and complete 'Mad With Terror'

'You must do what you can to help the city's defenders, [placeholder]!

'The Council of Gondor is in disarray. Go to the Dome of the Sun and learn what you can do to help them communicate their resolutions. Lamlor, the Captain of Tidings, will need help to send messages throughout Minas Tirith.

'Ingold is atop the wall on the north end of the Third Circle, and will need your help to manage his fear and the fears of the men behind the walls. Terror will be the greatest foe of our guardsmen, and they will need to master it if they are to mount an effective defence!

'The armies of Mordor have been using catapults and other siege weapons to launch burning stones over the walls and into the city. Find Rathon, the Warden of the Wells, in the Sixth Circle near the street that leads up to the Citadel, and help him extinguish some of the fires before they can spread!'

Lamlor can be found in the Dome of the Sun in besieged Minas Tirith. Ingold can be found atop the wall on the north end of the Third Circle in besieged Minas Tirith. Rathon can be found in the Sixth Circle near the street to the Citadel in besieged Minas Tirith.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minas Tirith is besieged! You may examine the model of the city in the Dome of the Sun to travel between states of the city.</rgb>
Talk to Rathon in the besieged city and complete 'Fires in the City'

Mithrandir is in besieged Minas Tirith, at TBD.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minas Tirith is besieged! You may examine the model of the city in the Dome of the Sun to travel between states of the city.</rgb>

Prince Imrahil is in besieged Minas Tirith, atop the wall on the south-east end of the Second Circle.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minas Tirith is besieged! You may examine the model of the city in the Dome of the Sun to travel between states of the city.</rgb>
Talk to Prince Imrahil in besieged Minas Tirith, atop the wall on the south-east end of the Second Circle
With Steward Denethor shut in the tower, mourning the final hours of his son Faramir, it is up to Mithrandir and Imrahil to mount the defence of the besieged city.

'There is no more leaving the city, [placeholder]. The Morgul-host has surrounded Minas Tirith, and the Pelennor is filled with their weapons of war. They have not yet broken the gate, but there is still much harm they can cause even from their position beyond the walls. You must do what you can to help the city's defenders!

'The Council of Gondor is in disarray. Go to the Dome of the Sun and learn what you can do to help them communicate their resolutions. Lamlor, the Captain of Tidings, will need help to send messages throughout Minas Tirith.

'Ingold is atop the wall on the north end of the Third Circle, and will need your help to manage his fear and the fears of the men behind the walls. Terror will be the greatest foe of our guardsmen, and they will need to master it if they are to mount an effective defence!

'The armies of Mordor have been using catapults and other siege weapons to launch burning stones over the walls and into the city. Find Rathon, the Warden of the Wells, in the Sixth Circle near the street that leads up to the Citadel, and help him extinguish some of the fires before they can spread!'
